title: eppaDi un manam appaDi naDattAi
sahitya:
eppaDi un manam appaDi naDattAi idayap-param shuDarE Om sharN


anupallavi

  appanum nIyE annaiyum nIyE un anbu dinam vaLara aruL purivAyE


caraNam    pArAlayattilE pala peyar vaDivuDan payilum pashupatiyE kArAgak-kaDalAgak-
kATrAgak-kadirAgak-kAkkum guNAnidhiyE nIrAi urugiya nenjat-taTattilE 
nilaviyAviyuDan kulavu shuddhAnanda nEyanE Apad-sahAyanE Om shivanE
